briefTitle: Digital 3D Breast Tomosynthesis Versus 2D in Clinical Evaluation of High Risk Women
officialTitle: 3D Digital Breast Tumorsynthesis Versus 2D Digital Mammography in the Clinical Evaluation of Women at High Risk for Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women
* more than 17% risk for breast cancer (IBIS calculation)
* \> 40y old

Exclusion Criteria:

* \< 40y old
